PricingProcedureOutputMap.name: PricingProcedureOutputMap
PricingProcedureOutputMap.description: Represents the mapping of the outputs of the pricing procedures to the associated lookup tables. Each record specifies the output mapping of the associated lookup table based on the pricing component type specified in the Pricing Recipe Table Mapping object.

IsPricingRecipeActive.description: Indicates if the pricing recipe is active (true) or not (false).

LookupField.description: Definition of the fields that are used for this lookup.

OutputFieldNameId.description: The field name containing the output type generated from the pricing element.

OutputFieldNameString.description: This is a derived field that references a specific column in a decision table or decision matrix.

OutputType.description: The output type generated from a pricing element.

PricingComponentType.description: The pricing component field data on which the decision table is built.

PricingRecipeTableMappingId.description: The mapping of pricing components of a lookup table with the chosen pricing recipe.
